To All ;oP   Why doesn't it work with some of you??? Because every PC has a different setup of hardware and software.. I got 2 different PC's and on 1 of them some games simply don't work.. I has got to do with mainboards, videocards and chipsets, even the brand of your cd rom drives can have effect....

And a lot of probably have a lot of programs running and are not even aware of it.. Try "proces explorer" from sysinternals.. replace taskmanager with this program and you will have a far more acurate list off running programs...

It helped me figure out a lot of what was going on in the background, while running a gam for instance!!!
For some it sucks, but hey.. Life's a Bitch, and then you Die !! :o))
